Articles.Content:
Do I need a lower spring strength here? Or a higher damper? Or both?

EDIT: holy crap this forum does not embed gifs well. Follow the link instead.

https://gfycat.com/AnotherVioletIcterinewarbler

Edited July 12, 2017 by blorgon
Playing with spring and damper settings is mostly black magic. I'd say higher damper will probably help the most.

When the command pod is a rockin... 

Meh, I'd leave it alone.
Easiest way (maybe) - retract the landing legs, make sure you don't break the solar panels.
Ended up going with lower spring strength (around 0.25, IIRC). It's a micro lander, so it's super-duper light. Anyway, it's working fine now.
